hackathon-judges.judge-role: The creator of the Elite Performance Indicator personality and competency assessment, the Co-Founder & Chairman of the Board of the Foundation for VETS, the Founder & CEO of VetStoreUSA™ and the President of Intelligent Governance Solutions, Inc.

As a recommendation from Major League Hacking.
